entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. entry.title: flobby41/e-commerce-template: Headless Shopify Demo A lightweight storefront built with Next.js using Shopify's Storefront API (GraphQL). Demonstrates integration with a Shopify Dev Store to fetch products and manage a local cart. Ideal for businesses exploring headless commerce.
entry.content: Headless Shopify Demo A lightweight storefront built with Next.js using Shopify's Storefront API (GraphQL). Demonstrates integration with a Shopify Dev Store to fetch products and manage a local cart. Ideal for businesses exploring headless commerce.

entry.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

entry.title: Maksim-Manojlovic/Web-tools: Web Tools is a collection of lightweight and efficient tools designed for web-related tasks such as image manipulation, PDF management, SEO analysis, and more. The repository includes utilities like H-Extractors, LinkCounter, Page-Speed-Analyze, TechSpy, and others. Each tool serves a unique purpose to optimize workflows for developers
entry.content: Web Tools is a collection of lightweight and efficient tools designed for web-related tasks such as image manipulation, PDF management, SEO analysis, and more. The repository includes utilities like H-Extractors, LinkCounter, Page-Speed-Analyze, TechSpy, and others. Each tool serves a unique purpose to optimize workflows for developers

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
